chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Morgase Trakand, p. 22 (9)—By the Grace of the Light, Queen of Andor, Defender of the Realm, Protector of the People, High Seat of House Trakand. Mother to Elayne and Gawyn. She was trained in the White Tower, as all Queens of Andor have, but was too weak in the One Power to do anything worthwhile with the knowledge she learned there. See also Damodred, Galadedrid; Damodred, Taringail; Gaebril; Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Gawyn.
